topic.title: Exercise: quer002 - Direct mail campaign box MARZ

section.p: Suppose it is end of December 2010. The expiration date of the box MARZ is in sight and there is still plenty in stock. That's why do you want to start a direct mail campaign to the customers who have ordered at least one box MARZ in the period August-November 2010. Show the name and address of the customers. Name the query quer002.

section.title: Solution
section.p: As condition for OrderDate you can also use Between #8/1/2010# And #11/30/2010#
